description: Creates a budget to set spending thresholds for your rendering activity.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique token which the server uses to recognize retries of the same request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID to include in this budget.

parameters.name: usageTrackingResource
parameters.description: The queue ID provided to this budget to track usage. queueId (string) --- The queue ID.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of the budget.

parameters.name: approximateDollarLimit
parameters.description: The dollar limit based on consumed usage.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: The budget actions to specify what happens when the budget runs out. (dict) --- The budget action to add. The type of budget action to add. The percentage threshold for the budget action to add. description (string) --- A description for the budget action to add.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of budget action to add.

nested_params.name: thresholdPercentage
nested_params.description: The percentage threshold for the budget action to add.

nested_params.name: description
nested_params.description: A description for the budget action to add.

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: The schedule to associate with this budget. fixed (dict) --- The fixed start and end time of the budget's schedule. When the budget starts. When the budget ends.

nested_params.name: fixed
nested_params.description: The fixed start and end time of the budget's schedule.
